## 

```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
SSMA <- read_csv("data/Students Social Media Addiction.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(SSMA, aes(x = Affects_Academic_Performance, fill = Academic_Level)) +
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Effect of Social Media on Academic Performance by Academic Level",
       x = "Affects Academic Performance",
       y = "Number of Students",
       fill = "Academic Level") +
  theme_minimal()


```

```{r}

SSMA$Academic_Level <- factor(
  SSMA$Academic_Level,
  levels = c("High School", "Undergraduate", "Graduate"),
  ordered = TRUE
)

ggplot(SSMA, aes(x = Academic_Level, y = Addicted_Score)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "skyblue") +
  labs(
    title = "Addicted Score by Academic Level",
    x = "Academic Level",
    y = "Addicted Score"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, hjust = 1))

```
